sections.heading: bonds; record; duty of local board
sections.text: Every board issuing bonds under the provisions of sections 10-301 to 10-304 shall keep a complete record of all transactions connected therewith.SourceLaws 1903, c. 10, § 5, p. 64;R.S.1913, § 404;C.S.1922, § 321;C.S.1929, § 11-305;R.S.1943, § 10-305.

10-305.Coupon bonds; record; duty of local board.

Every board issuing bonds under the provisions of sections 10-301 to 10-304 shall keep a complete record of all transactions connected therewith.

SourceLaws 1903, c. 10, § 5, p. 64;R.S.1913, § 404;C.S.1922, § 321;C.S.1929, § 11-305;R.S.1943, § 10-305.
